title: First initiation on RateGain Tech suggests 45% upside for this recent debutant - Economic Times
content: First initiation on RateGain Tech suggests 45% upside for this recent debutant  Economic Times
description: The brokerage in its coverage initiation report late last month said in a highly fragmented market, we believe RateGain Tech is well placed to increase its wallet share versus peers, as well as, in-house technology teams of enterprise customers, given its relationships with marquee clients, cross-selling opportunities, and innovative products.
